person.persName: Thomas H. Goodloe (Hopkins County carpenter and sheriff)

body.p: A Hopkins County carpenter. Married to Martha C. Hall Goodloe. Father of Julia Goodloe Todd. Served as sheriff in Hopkins County during an disputed election in 1862.

bibl.p: "Majority and Minority Reports in the Contested Election Case of Morton against Gregory, made to the House or Representatives, December 18, 1865," in Legislative Document, No. 13, (Frankfort, Ky.: George D. Prentice, State Printer, 1865), 27; Photo of Thomas H.
